title: We Have the Evidence, The Coverup Continues (Ep 1243)
description:
In this episode I address the disturbing effects of the continued economic lockdowns and I interview a business owner who was pulled out of his business in handcuffs for trying to work. I also discuss explosive developments in the General Mike Flynn case. Finally, I address the controversy brewing over the origins of the Wuhan Virus. 

News Picks:


The top eight fake news stories of the Trump years.

What happened to General Flynn was a disgrace.


A handy guide to the disgusting hit on General Mike Flynn. 


Religious liberty is under attack and the DOJ is putting its foot down. 


Snitch hotline shuts down after just 24 hours.

Some snitches are getting snitched on.

What’s the real story behind these economic lockdowns?
